channel.title: Problems with moparscape 3.2 with aryan!
channel.description:
Sup world i need help... with a few things listed below
1. how do i change attack look, when i attack enemies it looks like i'm throwing darts! even with whip! but i still walk up and hit out of them. 2. how do i add objects because theres no client notpad file... and i searched makeglobalobject in all files and can't find it. 3. is there godsword id codes??? 4.when i add drops to enemies ther all in 1 drop, not in seperate drops... 5. when i make a new account, theres no character creation thing, you just start as a guy with added clothes already. 6. how do you open doors, some cant be opened... and last i cant cast mage.
Can you help me? Nhoover12

item.title: Problems with moparscape 3.2 with aryan!
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

LMAO Im Just Saying Its Buggy As Fuck And It Would Be Easyer To Just Download A New Client + Source… Thats All.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with moparscape 3.2 with aryan!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

TimmahPwnz:

Moparscapw 3.2 is shit… Just Download A Client And Source From The Download Section, Thats The Answer For All Your Question. and with the drops, change drop type to how many drops its going to drop, i think?

So your saying everything MITB and the rest of the crew worked for nights is shit? I’d like to see you top MoparScape Client

Read full topic

@primadude wrote:

TimmahPwnz:

Moparscapw 3.2 is shit… Just Download A Client And Source From The Download Section, Thats The Answer For All Your Question. and with the drops, change drop type to how many drops its going to drop, i think?

The Moparscape client isn’t shit. It’s better than most shit clients nowadays - most of them has shitty programmed content, most things are hard-coded and they just fail in general.

@Nhoover12 wrote:

Sup world i need help… with a few things listed below

  1. how do i change attack look, when i attack enemies it looks like i’m throwing darts! even with whip! but i still walk up and hit out of them.
  2. how do i add objects because theres no client notpad file… and i searched makeglobalobject in all files and can’t find it.
  3. is there godsword id codes???
    4.when i add drops to enemies ther all in 1 drop, not in seperate drops…
  4. when i make a new account, theres no character creation thing, you just start as a guy with added clothes already.
  5. how do you open doors, some cant be opened…
    and last i cant cast mage.
